notesStmt.note: Much stained. Defective at the beginning and at the end.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A festival prayer book, according to the Italian rite.

supportDesc.foliation: Late Hebrew foliation between folios 9-180 (א-קסא), and four wrongly marked leaves after folio סו.

collation.p: Between folios 5-124: quires of mostly 10 leaves each, marked with catchwords and signatures at the end. After folio 125: irregular foldings and catchwords, no signatures.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian square script of the 15th century. Punctuated.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Machzor. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2088.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: D.A. Berliner: purchased from him by the British Museum on 31 October 1878: inscribed, [182v].
